question: Which Indian shooter has won the historic men’s skeet gold at the  Asian Shotgun Championship 2018 in Kuwait?
explanation: In the 8th Asian Shotgun Championship 2018 in Kuwait, Angad Vir Singh Bajwa has won the men’s skeet gold with a perfect score of 60 — a World record — in the final on November 7. With this, he became the first Indian skeet shooter to win a continental or world level event. Angad shot a perfect 60 out of 60 in the final round to claim top spot ahead of China\'s Di Jin who shot 58. UAE\'s Saeed Al Maktoum won bronze with a score of 46. In the concurrently held 11th Asian Air Gun championship,  Indian team of Elavenil Valarivan and Hriday Hazarika won the mixed air rifle gold with a world junior record of 502.1. The other Indian team of Mehuli Ghosh and Arjun Babuta bagged the bronze.
